page.title: 14THE STORY OF ELLEN STRANGE
page.content:
This is an interesting story from our area.
Ellen Strange lived at Ash Farm, Edgworth.One day in 1842 she visited Haslingden Fair,where she met a travelling pedlar.The two left the fair together,and Ellen was never seen alive again. Her body was later found in a lonely spot beyond the old Moor Road on Harcles Hill.When the pedlar was traced,he confessed to Ellen's murder and was hanged.
A cairn and a carved memorial stone now mark the spot where Ellen Strange died. It is the custom for anyone passing the cairn to add another stone to it in memory of Ellen Strange.
